home.description: Convert YouTube Music links to Spotify instantly
home.title: Convert Music Links Instantly
home.subtitle: Convert YouTube Music links to Spotify seamlessly. Fast, accurate, and free.

feature1.title: Lightning Fast
feature1.desc: Convert your music links in seconds with our optimized conversion engine.

feature2.title: High Accuracy
feature2.desc: Advanced matching algorithms ensure you get the right track every time.

feature3.title: Privacy Focused
feature3.desc: We don't store your URLs or personal data. Your privacy is our priority.

step1.title: Copy YouTube Music URL
step1.desc: Find the song on YouTube Music and copy its URL from your browser.

step2.title: Paste and Convert
step2.desc: Paste the URL into Linkfy and click the convert button.

step3.title: Get Spotify Link
step3.desc: Copy the generated Spotify URL and enjoy your music on Spotify.

cta.title: Ready to Convert Your Music?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of users converting music links every day.

help.title: Help & Support
help.subtitle: Get help with Linkfy and learn how to use it effectively

step1.title: Copy YouTube Music URL
step1.desc: Go to YouTube Music and copy the URL of the song you want to convert

step2.title: Paste and Convert
step2.desc: Paste the URL in Linkfy and click "Convert to Spotify"

step3.title: Get Spotify Link
step3.desc: Copy the generated Spotify URL and enjoy your music

howItWorks.question: How does Linkfy work?
howItWorks.answer: Linkfy uses YouTube Data API and Spotify Web API to extract track information and find matching songs between platforms.

supportedPlatforms.question: What platforms are supported?
supportedPlatforms.answer: Currently, Linkfy supports conversion from YouTube Music to Spotify. More platforms will be added in future updates.

accuracy.question: How accurate are the conversions?
accuracy.answer: Linkfy uses advanced matching algorithms to find the best matches. Accuracy depends on the availability of songs on both platforms and the quality of metadata.

free.question: Is Linkfy free to use?
free.answer: Yes, Linkfy is completely free to use. No subscription or payment required.

privacy.question: What about my privacy?
privacy.answer: Linkfy is privacy-focused. We don't store your URLs or personal data. All conversions are processed temporarily and securely.

help.githubDesc: Report bugs or request features on our GitHub repository
help.communityDesc: Join our community for discussions and help
help.tip1: Make sure the YouTube Music URL is for a specific song, not a playlist or channel
help.tip2: If a song is not found on Spotify, try searching for alternative versions or covers
help.tip3: Use the history feature to keep track of your successful conversions
help.tip4: Check the settings page to customize your conversion preferences
